verses.kjv: In that day shall this song be sung in the land of Judah; We have a strong city; salvation will God appoint for walls and bulwarks.
verses.ct: On that day, this song will be sung in the land of Judah: We have a fortified city; God establishes salvation as its walls and defenses.

verses.kjv: Open ye the gates, that the righteous nation which keepeth the truth may enter in.
verses.ct: Swing open the gates so that the righteous nation that remains faithful may come in.

verses.kjv: Thou wilt keep him in perfect peace, whose mind is stayed on thee: because he trusteth in thee.
verses.ct: You will guard with complete peace anyone whose thoughts are fixed on you, because that person trusts in you.

verses.kjv: Trust ye in the LORD for ever: for in the LORD JEHOVAH is everlasting strength:
verses.ct: Put your trust in the LORD forever, because the LORD God is an everlasting source of strength.

verses.kjv: For he bringeth down them that dwell on high; the lofty city, he layeth it low; he layeth it low, even to the ground; he bringeth it even to the dust.
verses.ct: He brings down those who live in high places; the proud city — he levels it, he levels it all the way to the ground, bringing it down to the dust.

verses.kjv: The foot shall tread it down, even the feet of the poor, and the steps of the needy.
verses.ct: Feet will trample over it — the feet of the oppressed, the steps of those in need.

verses.kjv: The way of the just is uprightness: thou, most upright, dost weigh the path of the just.
verses.ct: The path of the righteous person is smooth and straight; you, the perfectly upright One, make the road level for the righteous.

verses.kjv: Yea, in the way of thy judgments, O LORD, have we waited for thee; the desire of our soul is to thy name, and to the remembrance of thee.
verses.ct: Yes, LORD, as we walk in the way of your justice, we have waited for you; our soul longs for your name and for the memory of who you are.

verses.kjv: With my soul have I desired thee in the night; yea, with my spirit within me will I seek thee early: for when thy judgments are in the earth, the inhabitants of the world will learn righteousness.
verses.ct: My soul yearns for you during the night; my spirit deep within me searches for you at dawn. When your justice comes to the earth, the people of the world will learn righteousness.

verses.kjv: Let favour be shewed to the wicked, yet will he not learn righteousness: in the land of uprightness will he deal unjustly, and will not behold the majesty of the LORD.
verses.ct: Even if kindness is shown to the wicked, they still won't learn righteousness. In a land of integrity they will act corruptly, and they refuse to recognize the majesty of the LORD.

verses.kjv: LORD, when thy hand is lifted up, they will not see: but they shall see, and be ashamed for their envy at the people; yea, the fire of thine enemies shall devour them.
verses.ct: LORD, your hand is raised to act, but they don't notice. Let them see your passion for your people and be put to shame — yes, let the fire reserved for your enemies consume them.

verses.kjv: LORD, thou wilt ordain peace for us: for thou also hast wrought all our works in us.
verses.ct: LORD, you will establish peace for us, because everything we have accomplished, you have actually done through us.

verses.kjv: O LORD our God, other lords beside thee have had dominion over us: but by thee only will we make mention of thy name.
verses.ct: LORD our God, other rulers besides you have governed over us, but through you alone do we honor your name.

verses.kjv: They are dead, they shall not live; they are deceased, they shall not rise: therefore hast thou visited and destroyed them, and made all their memory to perish.
verses.ct: They are dead and will not come back to life; their spirits are gone and will not rise again. You punished them and wiped them out, erasing every trace of their memory.

verses.kjv: Thou hast increased the nation, O LORD, thou hast increased the nation: thou art glorified: thou hadst removed it far unto all the ends of the earth.
verses.ct: You have expanded the nation, LORD, you have expanded the nation. You are glorified! You have pushed its borders to the farthest ends of the earth.

verses.kjv: LORD, in trouble have they visited thee, they poured out a prayer when thy chastening was upon them.
verses.ct: LORD, in their distress they turned to you; they poured out whispered prayers when your discipline was on them.

verses.kjv: Like as a woman with child, that draweth near the time of her delivery, is in pain, and crieth out in her pangs; so have we been in thy sight, O LORD.
verses.ct: Like a pregnant woman approaching the time of delivery who writhes and cries out in her labor pains — that is what we were like in your presence, LORD.

verses.kjv: We have been with child, we have been in pain, we have as it were brought forth wind; we have not wrought any deliverance in the earth; neither have the inhabitants of the world fallen.
verses.ct: We were pregnant, we writhed in pain, but what we delivered was nothing but wind. We have not brought any rescue to the earth, and the world's inhabitants have not been overthrown.

verses.kjv: Thy dead men shall live, together with my dead body shall they arise. Awake and sing, ye that dwell in dust: for thy dew is as the dew of herbs, and the earth shall cast out the dead.
verses.ct: But your dead will live! Their bodies will rise! Wake up and shout for joy, you who lie in the dust! Your dew is like the dew of the morning on fresh plants, and the earth will give up its dead.

verses.kjv: Come, my people, enter thou into thy chambers, and shut thy doors about thee: hide thyself as it were for a little moment, until the indignation be overpast.
verses.ct: Go, my people, enter your rooms and close your doors behind you. Hide yourselves for just a little while until the fury has passed.

verses.kjv: For, behold, the LORD cometh out of his place to punish the inhabitants of the earth for their iniquity: the earth also shall disclose her blood, and shall no more cover her slain.
verses.ct: Look — the LORD is coming out from his dwelling to punish the people of the earth for their sin. The earth will reveal the blood that has been spilled on it and will no longer hide those who have been killed.
